meanings.definition: A piece of furniture with a writing surface and drawers for storing writing materials.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's antique escritoire had a beautiful wooden writing surface.
meanings.sent2: The office was furnished with elegant escritoires for the employees to work on.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to hide behind the escritoire and play peek-a-boo.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an escritoire of memories, each drawer holding a different moment in time.
meanings.sent5: The old escritoire in the corner of the room whispered stories of bygone eras.

meanings.sent1: The students gathered around the escritoire to collaborate on their project.
meanings.sent2: The author sat at the escritoire, pen in hand, ready to write his next novel.
meanings.sent3: The escritoire in the library was always the busiest spot during exam week.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed like a river as she sat at the escritoire, penning her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The escritoire stood proudly in the room, a symbol of creativity and inspiration.
